text:
In previous versions of jmeter, I was able to run 2 simple data writer in my test plan, 1 for capturing full results and 1 only for errors.

I recently ran a test in jmeter 3.1 with 2 simple data writers in the configuration I mentioned.  

The test only created 1 result file, the last one that was configured.  

I re-ran the test in a previous version and both files were created, I believe the issue is isolated to jmeter version 3.1
creator: errol.angus@manheim.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Created attachment 34599
Test showing no issue
